summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Catalyst Scoring System and Trade Templates features. All backend APIs (14/14 tests passed) and frontend UI components working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/catalyst/score-guide - Returns complete scoring rubric with ratings A+ to F
POST /api/catalyst/score/quick - Positive catalyst returns A+/STRONG_LONG rating
POST /api/catalyst/score/quick - Negative catalyst returns D/F/SHORT rating
POST /api/catalyst/score/quick - Neutral catalyst returns C/NEUTRAL rating
POST /api/catalyst/score/quick - Scores bounded between -10 and +10
GET /api/trades/templates/defaults - Returns 8 system templates (2 basic + 6 strategy)
GET /api/trades/templates/list - Returns all templates with user_count and default_count
Strategy templates have correct structure (strategy_id, market_context, risk_percent, reward_ratio)
Template risk/reward values are valid (0-5% risk, 1:1 to 5:1 R:R)
POST /api/trades - Creates trade with template values
POST /api/trades/from-template - Creates trade using template defaults
GET /api/catalyst/recent - Returns recent catalyst scores
GET /api/catalyst/history/{symbol} - Returns catalyst history for symbol
Full trade workflow: get templates -> create trade -> verify -> close trade
Earnings Calendar page - SCORE CATALYST button opens Quick Catalyst Scorer
Quick Catalyst Scorer - Form has EPS Beat %, Revenue Beat %, Guidance, Price Move %, Volume inputs
Quick Catalyst Scorer - Calculate Score returns rating (A+, B+, C, D, F) with component breakdown
Trade Journal page - Log Trade modal has Quick Template dropdown
Template Selector - Shows Basic Templates (Quick Long, Quick Short) and Strategy Templates
Template Selector - Selecting template pre-fills form with direction, shares, SL/TP calculations
Template applied message shows risk % and R:R ratio
seed_data_creation: Test trades created and cleaned up during tests (TEST_* prefixed symbols)

mocked_apis_list: Insider Trading data - uses simulated data

context_for_next_testing_agent: Catalyst Scoring System and Trade Templates fully implemented and tested. Quick Catalyst Scorer accessible via SCORE CATALYST button on earnings detail modal. Template Selector in Trade Journal pre-fills form with strategy defaults including auto-calculated SL/TP based on risk % and R:R ratio.

api_endpoints: POST /api/catalyst/score/quick - Quick scoring with simplified inputs
catalyst_scoring.ui_location: Earnings Calendar > Click stock row > SCORE CATALYST button

trade_templates.ui_location: Trade Journal > Log Trade > Quick Template dropdown
trade_templates.auto_calculations: SL/TP calculated from entry price using template risk_percent and reward_ratio
